comment.comment:
Outline

1   Introduction to FEM
2   A simple example by using ANSYS 
3   FEM formulations (1)
4   FEM formulations (2) 
5   Linear static structure analysis (1)
6   Linear static structure analysis (2) 
7   Linear static structure analysis (3)
8   Midterm Exam Nonlinear static structure analysis (1)
9   Nonlinear static structure analysis (2) 
10  Nonlinear static Structure analysis (3) 
11  Nonlinear static Structure analysis (4) 
12  Nonlinear static Structure analysis (5) 
13  Dynamic structure analysis (1)
14  Dynamic structure analysis (2) 
15  Dynamic structure analysis (3) 
16  Dynamic structure analysis (4) 
17  Thermal analysis 15 
18  Final Project

Homework: 30%
Midterm Exam: 30%
Final Project: 30%
Others (ex: Participation): 10%

工學院外系大學部去修機械所的課

評分有3部分：紙本作業+程式作業+2次考試

上課是上理論的內容(可以印老師的ppt或自己手抄筆記)
如果有上過有限元素法概論，或是材力熱力底子好
應該會很好上手

自己底子沒很好
又外系沒認識的人可以討論
作業寫得(打得)很辛苦
但做完脈絡會清晰很多

老師跟助教都很nice
有問題都可以去問
